adoption.callout.message: We can't keep track of all projects, so please let us know if you've adopted KawaiiPhysics! Even if you're not a developer, please tell us if you spot it in a game's license credits.
adoption.callout.description: Callout text for requesting adoption info

adoption.note.message: * Based on publicly available information. Please let us know if there are any issues with the listing.
adoption.note.description: Note at the bottom of the page
